```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Use English locale for rendering. If unavailable on your system, you can safely comment this out.
# Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "English")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(magrittr)
scroll_css <- "
.table-wrap { overflow-x:auto; }
table { width: 100%; }
"

theme_tbl_df <- function(df, caption = NULL, font_pct = 85) {
  stopifnot(is.data.frame(df))
  k <- knitr::kable(
    df,
    format  = "html",
    caption = caption,
    escape  = FALSE                 # << allows HTML in cells (tooltips, links, etc.)
  ) |>
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed","responsive"),
      full_width = TRUE,
      position   = "center"
    ) |>
    kableExtra::row_spec(
      0,
      background = "#d9edf7",
      bold = TRUE,
      extra_css = paste0("font-size:", font_pct, "%; text-align:center; vertical-align: middle;")
    ) |>
    kableExtra::column_spec(
      1,
      extra_css = paste0("white-space: nowrap; font-size:", font_pct, "%; text-align: left; vertical-align: top;")
    )

  if (ncol(df) > 1) {
    k <- k |>
      kableExtra::column_spec(
        2:ncol(df),
        extra_css = paste0("white-space: nowrap; font-size:", font_pct, "%; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;")
      )
  }
  k
}
```

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {

        if (!td.hasAttribute('data-label')) {

      });
    });
  });
});

# About us
VENTS GROUP Sp. z o.o. is a well-established company in the ventilation industry. At its inception, as Domus Ducting Polska Sp. z o.o., it was one of the few pioneers introducing mechanical ventilation systems to the Polish market. Following new trends and building customer awareness in the industry, the company has expanded its offer over the years to include heat recovery (HRV) solutions. Today, it offers a comprehensive range of products from ventilation grilles to modular air-handling units. This wide assortment is backed by the powerful resources of the international BLAUBERG Group with its seven production plants in Europe, of which Vents Group is a part.

As a company, we offer comprehensive ventilation and heat recovery solutions.  
Strengths: a wide portfolio, equipment availability, technical support, **"Czyste powietrze"** program (ZUM).

# Residential HRV

## Key benefits
- Energy savings (up to ~25% of heating costs).  
- Air filtration (smog, dust, allergens), no mold or drafts.  
- Better building energy class, higher property value.

---

## RENEO series 
![](images/Reneo.jpg)

<br>RENEO series advantages: 

- **Wide range** – suitable for both residential buildings and public utility spaces.
- **EPP housing** – ensures quiet operation without disturbing home comfort.
- **Fast and convenient installation** – compact design, intelligent connectors and a cardboard stencil to simplify mounting.
- **Intuitive configuration** – Plug & Play HRV with wired control and remote access via the VentsApp Cloud application.
- **High heat recovery efficiency** – minimizes heat losses in winter and reduces AC load in summer.
- **EC motor and high-efficiency counterflow heat exchanger** – reduces the building’s heat demand.
- **Automatic control** – comfortable indoor temperature, humidity and CO₂ level all year round.
- **Constant airflow module as standard** – allows flexible use.
- **Access to technical support and training materials.**
- **5-year warranty** after registration in VentsApp Cloud; standard 3 years.
- **App control** – full control from anywhere.

# Decentralized HRV

![](images/rekuperacja_decentralna.jpg)

## Why decentralized?
- No need for project design – time savings
- Fast and simple installation – no need to distribute ductwork
- Guaranteed continuous system operation
- Unit size, equipment and controls are tailored to the room’s needs
- Increased fire safety of the building
- Elimination of smog and allergens from tree, grass and cereal pollens thanks to high-class filters
- Hygienic system: no need to clean ventilation ducts 
- Possible to dismantle and reinstall in another room
- Ideal for retrofits and single rooms. *(Target market: renovated buildings, residential buildings, office buildings, institutional and public utility buildings – reading rooms, libraries, offices, kindergartens and schools)*

## **NEW**: Freshpoint series

![](images/Freshpoint-design-black-700-EN.png)
<h4>**Freshpoint series advantages:**</h4>

- **Wide application** – apartments, bedrooms, offices, small classrooms
- Devices available with **copper heat exchanger**, and soon with **ceramic heat exchanger**.
- **Wi‑Fi control** – mobile app, schedules, CO₂/tVOC sensors (Pro)
- **Easy operation** – display, remote control, voice control
- **Built‑in air stream separator** – prevents mixing of supply and extract air
- **G3 filters, condensate heater and heating foil** – improve thermal comfort.

```{r freshpoint_tbl}
freshpoint <- data.frame(
  Series                    = c("Freshpoint 160-E (PRO)", "Freshpoint 200-E (PRO)"),
  'Airflow [m³/h]<span title="MAX in BOOST mode">*</span>' = c('~15–70','~15–90'),
  "Heat recovery efficiency" = c("up to 88%", "up to 85%"),
  "Sound level [dB(A)/3 m]" = c("12–42", "15–45"),
  'Power consumption [W]<span title="Device power draw without heater">*</span>' = c('5–22', "5–22"),
  check.names = FALSE
)

theme_tbl_df(freshpoint, caption = "Freshpoint series — parameters")
```

Contact us to learn more about the Freshpoint series.

## Freshbox series
![](images/Freshbox.jpg)
<h4>**Freshbox series — air-handling units for single rooms:**</h4>
- **Full ventilation** — simultaneous supply and extract with heat recovery up to 96%
- **Energy savings** — high-efficiency counterflow heat exchanger limiting heating losses
- **Winter comfort** — optional electric heater for supply-air preheating
- **Air filtration** — multi-stage filters capturing dust, allergens and smog *(option to use H13 class filters with effectiveness up to 99% for smog removal)*
- **Simple operation** — control panel, remote or Wi‑Fi control in Freshbox Wi‑Fi models

## CIVIC series 

![](images/Civic.jpg)

<h4>**Civic series advantages:**</h4>
- **Designed for larger rooms** — ideal for schools, offices, conference rooms and libraries
- **High airflow** — models with airflow up to 1200 m³/h
- **High efficiency** — heat recovery at 90–96% thanks to counterflow heat exchangers
- **Smart management** — S21 system with BMS and Smart Home integration
- **Comfort and safety** — quiet operation, automatic airtight dampers, acoustic and thermal insulation

# AirVents air-handling units

![](images/AirVents_EN.jpg)

## Compact units

- **Ready to run** — factory *plug & play* configuration, quick installation
- **Fully equipped** — heat exchanger, fans and controls in one casing + selected accessories
- **Space saving** — compact design ideal for buildings with limited technical space
- **Energy efficient** — EC fans and high-efficiency heat exchangers
- **Easy to use** — control system with control panel

![](images/AirVents2.jpg)

---

![](images/AirVents1.jpg)

- **Configuration flexibility** — option to combine modules (heaters, coolers, filters, silencers) as required by the project  
- **Scalability** — from smallto very large ventilation systems  
- **Advanced automation** — compatibility with building management systems (SCADA, BMS)
- **Service & maintenance** — easy access to sections, simplified operation  
- **Professional applications** — ideal for industrial, retail and large public utility buildings  
- **Plug & play execution**

# Part of Blauberg Group

Blauberg Group representative offices and partner branches are located in many countries across different continents to ensure timely delivery of products and services to all customers.

In production facilities with a total area of over 210,000 m², we employ more than 3,500 highly qualified specialists who manufacture top-quality products offered in over 120 countries worldwide.

![](images/mapka.jpg)

Learn more on the [Vents Group website](https://vents-group.pl/) or at [blauberg.pl](blauberg.pl).
